top_comments.comment: Frank Dee Mac... We kno who stole those tickets...or did the they get this from always sunny in philly...

comments_since_last_sample.body: Straight out of ( breaking bad) 😆 God I wish they would make another season.
Who the hell leaves 77k worth of jewelry in their house when they will be fumigating it for days??
And next on the news burglar dies from fume inhalation, don’t they realize that chemical can travel thru porous concrete and easily into your blood stream?

She knows to hide her jewelery! You don't leave 80k in plain sight! Foolish woman!!! That that stupid music at every one of these videos and is ridiculous I would live a thousand lifetimes and if I never heard that stupid sound of composition again I'd be so happy
Is it an inside job maybe

I don't buy her story of "77 thousand of her grandmother's jewlery"
Who's stupid enough not to put it in a safe?
Common sense tells me to put 77,000 dollars worth of anything into a safe lady. Quit blaming other people for your simple mistakes.
